Articles.Content: Hey, I got the latest version of mechjeb for 0.15 and I noticed there was a rendezvous module mode but I have no idea how to work it, can someone please explain it for me?
Just a tip, post for help in the thread where you got it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
